mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLASS VALUES ( #{classIdx}, #{classTitle}, #{categoryIdx}, #{classStatus}, #{classPrice}, #{classMember}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{classDays}, #{location}, now(), null, #{userIdx}, #{classType}, #{classIntro}, #{classContent}, #{classPic1} )
mapper.select: SELECT C.*, PC.CATEGORY_NAME AS parent_category_name, CC.CATEGORY_NAME AS child_category_name FROM CLASS C JOIN CATEGORY CC ON C.CATEGORY_IDX = CC.CATEGORY_IDX LEFT JOIN CATEGORY PC ON CC.PARENT_IDX = PC.CATEGORY_IDX

SELECT C.*, PC.CATEGORY_NAME AS parent_category_name, CC.CATEGORY_NAME AS child_category_name FROM CLASS C JOIN CATEGORY CC ON C.CATEGORY_IDX = CC.CATEGORY_IDX LEFT JOIN CATEGORY PC ON CC.PARENT_IDX = PC.CATEGORY_IDX
Datediff(C.END_DATE, C.START_DATE) <= 2
Datediff(C.END_DATE, C.START_DATE) >= 3

SELECT c.class_idx , c.class_title , c.category_idx , c.class_status , c.class_price , c.class_member , c.start_date , c.end_date , c.class_days , c.location , c.user_idx , c.class_type , c.class_intro , c.class_content , f.file_id , f.original_file_name , f.real_file_name , f.sub_dir , f.file_size , f.content_type FROM CLASS c LEFT JOIN FILE f ON c.class_idx = f.idx WHERE c.class_idx = #{classIdx}
